Reviews.Title: Pretty neat, saved me buying a new camera!
Reviews.Author: fishhndan
Reviews.Content: I was heartbroken when I crdacked the screen on my not so old camera and thought that was the end of that.  I thenI watched a You Tube video about changing this screen and ordered this replacement, not that expensive, not that difficult to change (took me two tries but that's not bad.  Turned out great, I'm back to taking pictures for less than ten dollars!

Reviews.Title: Glad to find this Replacement Screen
Reviews.Author: Daniel Bowman
Reviews.Content: This replacement LCD screen is working very well and was fairly easy to replace.  So glad to find this and have my camera working again.  Much better solution than having to buy another sony camera.

Reviews.Title: It has been almost a week and they still have my product!
Reviews.Author: Buyer
Reviews.Content: Like i was saying it has been almost a week & they have still not shipped my product .. THE MONEY WAS TAKEN OUT OF MY ACCOUNT ALMOST A WEEK AGO!! This is not fair

Reviews.Title: Easy to install
Reviews.Author: R. Lewis "samplerman"
Reviews.Content: First of all, I purchased this screen from some guy on Amazon ...trying to save money...it was the cheapest.  It never came.  Three weeks later they refund my money.  So I decide to buy one from TopBang.  It came within days very nicely boxed.  I removed 7 screws, popped off the back and replaced the screen.  It wouldnt light up at first...I hadnt pushed the connector all the way in.  After reinstalling it, it lit right up!  Fit perfectly from the git-go.  Highly recommended.  All you need is a jeweler's phillips screwdriver.
